name: Gravity Breakers
description:
DISCORD | TWITTER | INSTAGRAM | FACEBOOK | WEBSITE

Are you ready for gravity defying combat?

Lock on and kick some ass! Switch seamlessly between bone crushing strikes up-close and devastating firepower at a distance.

Gravity Breakers is a 1-4 player gravity defying fighting game currently in development by Gremlin_Ent.

Early Access

Buy it now for the Early Bird price and get access to the full game when it releases. As more content gets added the price will increase until we reach the ver.1.0 (full price). All purchases/donations will directly fund further development of the game. All itch.io keys will be transferable to Steam.

Buying this prototype grants you:

  • Access to prototype updates + alpha + beta + final game
  • Wallpapers
  • Other goodies
What's In This Build
  • Supports 1-2 players (player vs player, player vs punching bag, player vs CPU)
  • Gamepad/joystick support
  • Three complete characters (Cardinal, Nancy, and Gerzil)
  • Sick background art
  • Life bar, shield gauge, and super gauge
  • Infinite prevention system
Planned Features
  • 1-4 players simultaneously, play on teams or free-for-all
  • 8 characters total
  • 8 stages total
  • Lots of modes: local versus, training, singleplayer mission, online matchmaking w/ lobbies
  • Online modes supported by GGPO

Check out the Changelog gameplay additions.
